name: Company Management - Create companies
description: As a manager I must able to create new organisation group.

steps.name: put /companies with { name: "MegaCom", logoPath:"http://url.any", description: "Any description" }
put /companies with { name: "MegaCom", logoPath:"http://url.any", description: "Any description" }
having companies Com1, Com2, Com3, Com4, Com5, Com6

arguments.val: Com1, Com2, Com3, Com4, Com5, Com6

name: Company Management - List companies
description: As a manager I must able to list all companies considering filtering, ordering and pagination.

elements.name: When updating without details company must remain as is

steps.name: put /companies with { name: "MegaCom", logoPath:"http://url.any", description: "Any description" }
put /companies with { name: "MegaCom", logoPath:"http://url.any", description: "Any description" }
put /companies with { name: "MegaCom", logoPath:"http://url.any", description: "Any description" }
post /companies/${id} with { description: "New description for this company" }
response contains: "description":"New description for this company"
put /companies with { name: "MegaCom", logoPath:"http://url.any", description: "Any description" }
post /companies/${id} with { details: { very: "Cool", json: "Details", description: "Super feature that allows to put any kind of data in JSON format" } }

arguments.val: { details: { very: "Cool", json: "Details", description: "Super feature that allows to put any kind of data in JSON format" } }

steps.name: response contains: "details":{"very":"Cool","json":"Details","description":"Super feature that allows to put any kind of data in JSON format"}

arguments.val: "details":{"very":"Cool","json":"Details","description":"Super feature that allows to put any kind of data in JSON format"}

steps.name: put /companies with { name: "MegaCom", logoPath:"http://url.any", description: "Any description" }
post /companies/${id} with { name: "Oracle", logoPath:"http://oracle.com", description: "I think you heard about it.", details: { has_software:"yes" } }

arguments.val: { name: "Oracle", logoPath:"http://oracle.com", description: "I think you heard about it.", details: { has_software:"yes" } }

steps.name: response contains: {"name":"Oracle","logoPath":"http://oracle.com","description":"I think you heard about it.","details":{"has_software":"yes"}

name: Login

elements.name: Create user without being logged in

steps.name: request user creation for: john@carter.com with password "an0nymus" as John Carter

elements.name: Create user having no rights for that

steps.name: request user creation for: john@carter.com with password "an0nymus" as John Carter
request user creation for: john@carter.com with password "an0nymus" as John Carter
put /users with { email:"john@carter.com", displayName:"John Carter", password: "password", passwordConfirmation: "password", roles: ["MANAGE_USERS"] }

arguments.val: { email:"john@carter.com", displayName:"John Carter", password: "password", passwordConfirmation: "password", roles: ["MANAGE_USERS"] }

elements.name: Create user with custom details (in JSON format)

steps.name: put /users with { email:"john@carter.com", displayName:"John Carter", password: "password", passwordConfirmation: "password", details: { gender: "male"} }

arguments.val: { email:"john@carter.com", displayName:"John Carter", password: "password", passwordConfirmation: "password", details: { gender: "male"} }
